name: See You Sea Cowboy
description:
A fun little exploration game to collect fantastical fish - with a Western twist!

Play as a cowboy on his seahorse steed who has to round up missing fish, but beware of a lurking danger.. waiting for a chance to attack! Keep an eye on your oxygen levels as you traverse the level and go deeper.

Easy controls and straightforward gameplay will make this one for anyone who wants something simple during down time.
